mapper.insert: insert into client(dvs, name, item, person, email, phone_cell, phone_com, fax, address, bank, account_num, account_name, license_num, type1, type2, ceo, clas, refer) values( #{dvs}, #{name}, #{item}, #{person, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone_cell, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone_com, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fax, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bank, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{account_num, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{account_name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{license_num, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type1, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type2, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ceo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clas, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{refer, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
